tasks.description: Revamp the design of album_list_page.dart to resemble Instagram's layout, enhancing user experience for viewing photos.
tasks.details: To redesign the album_list_page.dart, start by analyzing Instagram's UI for photo grids and navigation patterns. Implement a grid layout using Flutter's GridView widget to display photos in a visually appealing manner. Ensure that the grid is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes. Use the cached_network_image package to efficiently load and cache images, improving performance.
